titles.title: Food Security and Land Stewardship Act of 2001

To amend the Agricultural Market Transition Act to establish a flexible fallow program under which a producer may idle a portion of the total planted acreage of the loan commodities of the producer in exchange for higher loan rates for marketing assistance loans on the remaining acreage of the producer.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 1/3/2001--Introduced. Food Security and Land Stewardship Act of 2001 - Amends the Agricultural Market Transition Act to establish a flexible fallow program for the 2001 and 2002 crop years under which a producer may idle a portion of the total loan commodity acreage in exchange for higher marketing assistance loan rates on the remaining acreage.
